channel.title: CVE Feed for Anblik -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Anblik -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-1002011|2024-09-17T01:11:37.871Z -- anblik -- image-gallery-with-slideshow
item.description: Vulnerability in wordpress plugin image-gallery-with-slideshow v1.5.2, There is a stored XSS vulnerability via the $value->gallery_name and $value->gallery_description where anyone with privileges to modify or add galleries/images and inject javascript into the database.

item.title: CVE-2017-1002013|2024-09-17T02:36:37.985Z -- anblik -- image-gallery-with-slideshow
item.description: Vulnerability in wordpress plugin image-gallery-with-slideshow v1.5.2, Blind SQL Injection via imgid parameter in image-gallery-with-slideshow/admin_setting.php.
